name: Gilly

specialAbilities.name: Halfling Nimbleness
specialAbilities.description: Gilly can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than her.

specialAbilities.name: Lucky
specialAbilities.description: When Gilly rolls a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

specialAbilities.name: Brave
specialAbilities.description: Gilly has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

specialAbilities.name: Sneak Attack
specialAbilities.description: Gilly deals an extra 2d6 damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Gilly that isn't incapacitated and Gilly doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

specialAbilities.name: Cunning Action
specialAbilities.description: Gilly can take a bonus action on each of her turns to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

equipment.description: A set of tools for picking locks and disarming traps
A tool for prying things open
A set of dark clothing with a hood
A finely crafted dagger with engravings
A gem that catches the light beautifully
A map detailing the old mining operations.
A map detailing hidden passages within the mines.

personality: Gilly appears calm and cool in every situation, but it's a carefully crafted mask to hide her quick temper and impulsive tendencies. She's always scheming, looking for an angle to profit, but she genuinely cares about her friendsâ€”she just has a hard time showing it without making a joke out of everything.
ideals: Freedom is the most important thing, but I sometimes forget that true freedom means having people to share it with.
bonds: I owe everything to my benefactor, but I fear one day I won't be able to repay my debtâ€”and they won't forgive me.
flaws: Gilly is dangerously impulsive when she sees an opportunity for gain. She has a hard time resisting temptation, whether it's shiny treasures or a risky gamble, and it can often put her and her companions in harm's way.

classFeatures.name: Expertise
classFeatures.description: Gilly's proficiency bonus is doubled for two skill proficiencies of her choice.
